sqlMap.select: SELECT t.order_id AS orderId, t.item_name AS itemName, t.properties_name AS propertiesName, t.quantity, t.price, t.points, t.change, t.item_id AS itemId, t.sku_id AS skuId, CASE WHEN q.stock IS NULL THEN p.stock ELSE q.stock END AS stock FROM MALL.MALL_TB_ORDER t, MALL.MALL_TB_ITEM p, (SELECT qq.sku_id, qq.stock FROM MALL.MALL_TB_ITEM_SKU qq WHERE qq.state = 'U' )q WHERE t.item_id = p.item_id AND t.sku_id = q.sku_id(+) AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.trade_id = #tradeId#
